scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue robe, holds the Christ Child on her lap. One of the Magi, kneeling, offers a gift. Behind them, other figures are gathered, including a man in a green robe with inscriptions, and a figure with dark skin wearing a golden turban. The background reveals an architectural setting with columns and arches, through which a landscape with buildings and a star is visible. The overall composition is framed by decorative borders.
